name: PostgRest

values.name: field
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (a -> String) -> String -> PostgRest.Field a

values.name: filter
values.type: List (schema -> PostgRest.Filter) -> PostgRest.Query schema a -> PostgRest.Query schema a

values.name: first
values.comment: Takes `url` and a `query`, returning the first object from database on success and Http.Error otherwise
values.type: String -> PostgRest.Query schema a -> Task.Task Http.Error a

values.name: in'
values.type: List a -> (schema -> PostgRest.Field a) -> schema -> PostgRest.Filter

values.name: include
values.type: PostgRest.Query schema2 a -> PostgRest.Query schema1 (a -> b) -> PostgRest.Query schema1 b

values.name: includeMany
values.type: Maybe.Maybe Int -> PostgRest.Query schema2 a -> PostgRest.Query schema1 (List a -> b) -> PostgRest.Query schema1 b

values.name: list
values.comment: Takes `limit`, `url` and a `query`, returning a list of objects from database on success and Http.Error otherwise
values.type: Maybe.Maybe Int -> String -> PostgRest.Query schema a -> Task.Task Http.Error (List a)

values.name: not'
values.type: (a -> (schema -> PostgRest.Field a) -> schema -> PostgRest.Filter) -> a -> (schema -> PostgRest.Field a) -> schema -> PostgRest.Filter

values.name: order
values.type: List (schema -> PostgRest.OrderBy) -> PostgRest.Query schema a -> PostgRest.Query schema a

values.name: paginate
values.type: { pageNumber : Int, pageSize : Int } -> String -> PostgRest.Query schema a -> Task.Task Http.Error (PostgRest.Page a)

values.name: query
values.type: PostgRest.Resource schema -> (a -> b) -> PostgRest.Query schema (a -> b)

values.name: select
values.type: (schema -> PostgRest.Field a) -> PostgRest.Query schema (a -> b) -> PostgRest.Query schema b
